headline: Ventas Announces Pricing of an Underwritten Offering of 10.6 Million Shares of Common Stock
summary: CHICAGO, November 14, 2024--Ventas, Inc. (NYSE: VTR) ("Ventas" or the "Company") announced today that it priced an underwritten public offering of 10,600,000 shares of its common stock in connection with the forward sale agreement described below for gross proceeds of approximately $677 million before underwriting discounts and estimated offering expenses payable by the Company.
